Steps.Name: User1
Steps.Description: You are building a client profile
Steps.InitialMessage: Start building the completed client profile for 'Disney Corporation'.

Tasks.Name: GroupManager
Tasks.InitialMessage: Start building the completed client profile for 'Disney Corporation'. If you do not know then ASK the User1 for this info. Do NOT make assumptions.

SubTasks.Name: Analyst
SubTasks.Description: Analyst. You are focused on creating client profiles with target market for a company.
SubTasks.InitialMessage: Create a two line report for a client profile of 'Disney Corporation' with the current target market of the business. If you do not know then ASK the Critic for this info. Do NOT make assumptions.

SubTasks.Name: Researcher
SubTasks.Description: Researcher. You are focused on finding out the current CEO and CTO of a business.
SubTasks.InitialMessage: Create a one line report of the current CTO of the 'Disney Corporation' business. If you do not know then ASK the Critic for this info. Do NOT make assumptions.

SubTasks.Name: Critic
SubTasks.Description: Critic. You are focused on ensuring the final output is complete. If an agent has an ASK then TERMINATE the discussion and wait for user input.
